DOC.brief_summary: Baseline self-report outcome measure complete additional assessment occur mid-treatment , post-treatment , 3 month follow completion session , 6 month follow completion session . Patients therapists complete evaluation measure private ( home , office ) . At University Kentucky Markey Cancer Center , BBI treatment offer group individual format . The course individual treatment varies group treatment consist 10 1.5-hour weekly session `` intensive '' phase , follow 2 1.5-hour bi-weekly maintenance session . Individual treatment one-on-one . In group treatment , typically 6-12 patient per group 1 2 therapist . The intervention help patient learn adaptive coping strategy apply daily stressor . Additional content discus use seek information , enhance social support , enhance body esteem intimacy , maintain positive change .
DOC.criteria: Females Stage IIV gynecologic cancer ( include ovarian , uterine , cervical , vulvar , vaginal cancer ) Undergoing active treatment remission undergo active surveillance ; age ≥21 ≤80 Able speak/read English . Concurrent diagnosis organic brain syndrome , dementia , mental retardation NonEnglish speaking , significant sensory deficit Major mental illness ( e.g. , schizophrenia , psychotic disorder ) .
